# PRD: Large Feature Set

## Overview

A comprehensive PRD with 10+ stories for testing pagination and progress tracking.

## User Stories

### [ ] US-001: Initialize Project

**As a** developer
**I want** project scaffolding
**So that** development can begin

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create directory structure
- [ ] Add package.json

### [ ] US-002: Add Logging

**As a** developer
**I want** logging functionality
**So that** debugging is easier

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add logger module
- [ ] Configure log levels

### [ ] US-003: Add Error Handling

**As a** developer
**I want** error handling
**So that** failures are caught

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add try/catch blocks
- [ ] Create error classes

### [ ] US-004: Add Input Validation

**As a** developer
**I want** input validation
**So that** data is sanitized

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Validate user inputs
- [ ] Add schema validation

### [ ] US-005: Add Unit Tests

**As a** developer
**I want** unit tests
**So that** code is verified

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add test framework
- [ ] Write test cases

### [ ] US-006: Add Integration Tests

**As a** developer
**I want** integration tests
**So that** modules work together

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create test fixtures
- [ ] Write integration tests

### [ ] US-007: Add Documentation

**As a** user
**I want** documentation
**So that** I can understand the system

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Write API docs
- [ ] Add usage examples

### [ ] US-008: Add CI/CD Pipeline

**As a** developer
**I want** automated testing
**So that** code quality is maintained

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Configure GitHub Actions
- [ ] Add automated tests

### [ ] US-009: Add Performance Monitoring

**As a** developer
**I want** performance metrics
**So that** bottlenecks are identified

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add metrics collection
- [ ] Create dashboard

### [ ] US-010: Add Security Scanning

**As a** developer
**I want** security checks
**So that** vulnerabilities are caught

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add dependency scanning
- [ ] Configure SAST tools

### [ ] US-011: Add Deployment Scripts

**As a** developer
**I want** deployment automation
**So that** releases are streamlined

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create deploy script
- [ ] Add rollback mechanism

### [ ] US-012: Add User Feedback

**As a** user
**I want** to provide feedback
**So that** my voice is heard

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add feedback form
- [ ] Store feedback data
